homeAbout: Genesis Fashion & Design established as a one-stop garments solution for the global apparel market to meet customer’s expectation providing feature products and services on time. Genesis is stubborn to procure the most advanced and sophisticated expertise for producing desired product and quoted to its customers with confidence “YOU TAG IT WE MAKE IT”.
certificateHeader: We are unique for our certified associates
footerSub: One Stop Garments Solution in Bangladesh
aboutTitle: We are a sourcing agency located in Bangladesh
whoWeAre: Genesis is a Garments Buying house & sourcing Agent in Bangladesh since 2005. We offer a shorter chain between Buyer & Manufacturer. With our relentless effort, dynamic planning & proper follow-up we have proved our transparency about quality, on-time delivery and competitive price by which we have been able to build our confidence and reputation to all of our buyers. As a result, it has become possible for us to run into the marathon of global market.
ourVision: To attain customer satisfaction by delivering nothing but the best, by means of utilizing the highest quality of resources and world-class systems.
ourMission: GENESIS FASHION & DESIGN is committed to the consistent upliftment and improvement of both its products and its responsibilities towards its employees. Striving hard to achieve highest levels of customer satisfaction through timely deliveries along with enhanced quality and value of all our products.
valueMsg: We value employment & teamwork everywhere we operate because we know that when we roll our sleeves & work together, nothing is beyond our reach. The pride that we have in every product we make and every life we touch can be seen through our commitment to our employees, customers, buyers worldwide.
serviceDetails1: Sourcing of reliable Garment Manufacturer & Exporter in Bangladesh.
serviceDetails2: Sourcing of Fabric mills, yarn mills, trims & accessories manufacturer and supplier in Bangladesh, China, Taiwan, India, Pakistan etc.
serviceDetails3: Procure & provide dierent types of samples (SMS, FIT, Size-set, Proto, PP etc.) as well as trims/accessories as per Buyer requirement.
serviceDetails4: Garment price costing & negotiation with Garments Factory on behalf of Buyer.
serviceDetails5: On going communication with Buyer concerning the whole process.
serviceDetails6: Make Time and Action(T&A) plan for each order/programs.
serviceDetails7: Our merchandisers and quality control team monitor quality of fabric, accessories/trims & production process from the very beginning till shipment.
serviceDetails8: Monitor goods sending to port, customs clearance, loading to vessel & ensure the shipment.
serviceDetails9: Selection of appropriate manufacturing unit that match with customer requirement for quality, quantity, cost as well as compliance.
contactSuccess: Your query has been sent. Our team will contact with you shortly.
productHeader: We work with bold brands that we believe in
